reviewText: Not worth the purchase. Very little useful info and some of the talent can barely articulate a coherent sentence. Not to take away from their talents on the guitar, just the inability to verbally explain. For some one considering this item there are much better tutorials available.

Very good product...informative ..accurate...and knowledgeable on the subject...the only issue I had is not enough material on mechanics and getting the correct intonation of notes...string muting and the like....overall very good buy!
